snippet.title: 【PV】Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days 2
snippet.description:
A new release has been confirmed!
The digital game that lets you play Vanguard on Nintendo Switch and Steam.

Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days 2
On sale Jan. 30, 2025 for Nintendo Switch/Steam!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days Official Website: https://vgdd2.cf-vanguard.com/
English Edition Cardfight!! Vanguard Official Twitter: @cfvanguard_en
English Edition Cardfight!! Vanguard Official Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/CardfightVanguard

#CardfightVanguard #tcg #switch #steam
